text: ঘুমন্ত শহরে (In the Sleeping City) is the fifth studio album Bangladeshi rock band LRB. It was released on 13 July 1995, by Soundtek Electronics Limited. It was their first album to feature drummer Riyad, following the departure of previous drummer Milton Akbar. == Track listing == == Personnel == LRB * Ayub Bachchu - lead singer, lead guitar * S.I. Tutul - keyboards, backing vocals, rhythm guitars * Saidul Hasan Swapan - bass guitars * Riyad - drums Production * Azam Babu - Sound Engineering and Mixing * Mainul Islam - Sleeve design Lyrics * Angel Shofik - Track 1,3,8 and 10 * Jayed Amin - Tracks 2 and 9 * Bappi Khan - Tracks 4,6 and 11 * Ayub Bachchu - Track 5 * Latiful Islam Shibly - Track 6 * Tanvir Murshed Khan - Track 12 == References == Category:1995 albums Category:Love Runs Blind albums
